title: Station Country: The Collection
description: Station Country. Omnibus edition. Philip Holden. 2001 1st edition . Philip Holden makes a journey to a large number of Sheep Stations, meets the people who own and work on them, and hears their history. Each story has a large number of interesting photos, many full page. Four sections, each with a location map; South Island High Country runs; On the mainland; more South Island Stations; North of Cook Strait; North from coast to plateau. Features 359pp; coloured photos; location maps; bibliography; large thick s/covers, self wrappers;
author: Philip  Holden
